page.title: 10Farm Worker
page.content: My dad is a farm worker on "Larglea". Every morning he has to get up at 7.45 to go and work in a parlour where cows are milked. The parlour is different from an ordinary byre as it is automated and you don't need to feed each animal by hand. There is an "ogre" which is a long tube that comes from a tower which stores the feed that supplies the parlour. Another main job is feeding young calves. If they are under two weeks they get their mothers' milk. If they are older they get powdered milk. Then they can go into the fields to feed themselves. They are not ready for milking until they are at least 3 years old. Every night my dad has to clean the parlour with the pressure hose. It is the easiest job of all. This time of year is busiest because it is time to harvest the crops.
